contribution_desc:
Study of re-directing techniques in multi-device environments.
Differentiate INPUT redirection and CONTENT redirection. Which they then study and compare, in various seating arrangements.
evaluation: Quantitative measurements for techniques, such as transition time; Qualitative
devices_included: Any screen device; Laptop; Desktop computer
interaction_techniques: Content redirection (key swap, edit blind); Input redirection (extended desktop, multi-monitor mouse)
crossdevice_def:
Use MDE, Multi device environment, terminology.
In particular: collaborative MDEs -- users sharing information and applications in a group setting, interacting with each other using fixed large shared displays, and incorporating their personal devices into the environment.
